Uses of Class
com.objsys.asn1j.runtime.Asn1OerEncodeBuffer

    • Uses of Asn1OerEncodeBuffer in com.objsys.asn1j.runtime

      Methods in com.objsys.asn1j.runtime that return Asn1OerEncodeBuffer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Asn1OerEncodeBuffer Asn1OerEncodeBuffer.beginSetOf()
      If canonical mode is on, return a new Asn1OerEncodeBuffer into which the repetitions of a SET OF can be encoded.
      Asn1OerEncodeBuffer Asn1OerEncodeBuffer.endSetOf()
      If canonical mode is on, encode each of the SET OF occurrences, in sorted order, to the original buffer, the one that created this buffer.
      Asn1OerEncodeBuffer Asn1OerEncodeBuffer.newBuffer()
      Return a new OER encode buffer with the same canonical mode setting as this buffer.
